articles.title: No hijab in minority institutions? K'taka govt issues order - India Today
articles.description: Karnataka government has issued a circular saying the high court proposal of no religious garments in educational institutions is applicable to minority institutions as well. Hijab is part of the official uniform in some minority institutions.
